name: floG
description:
Flick Flogger through, around and directly into various obstacles in what would otherwise be a rather pleasant round of golf.  Warning: Might not be suitable for those with aversions to digitalized red liquids.

[Controls]
Click/Tap & Drag to aim. Release to Flick.

[DevNotes]
VERY early build.  We know.  Lots of bugs / issues. Only 3 holes.  Updates being made regularly throughout Feb 2018.
